quizDescription: Put your sock knowledge to the test with this hilariously quirky sock-themed quiz!

questions.question: What do you call socks that are afraid of the dark?
questions.explanation: Scaredy Socks are socks that are afraid of the dark. They might need a nightlight!

questions.question: Why did the sock go to therapy?
options: To work on its toe issues
questions.answer: To work on its toe issues
questions.explanation: The sock went to therapy to work on its toe issues. It had a lot of 'toe-rrifying' problems!

questions.question: What did one sock say to the other sock on laundry day?
questions.explanation: One sock said to the other, 'We make a great pair!' They sure do!

questions.question: What do you call a sock that tells jokes?
questions.explanation: A sock that tells jokes is a 'laugh sock.' It's all about those socky punchlines!

questions.question: What's a sock's favorite dance move?
questions.explanation: A sock's favorite dance move is 'The Sock Hop'! It really knows how to boogie!
